name: Epsi Bit: Jumping Up
description:
Catch as many 'Little Ones' as you can. Over the time Little Ones will mutate into 'Big Ones'. If you collide with a Big One, game is over. If you fail to rescue at least one Little One, game is over.

Game is controlled by arrows (left, right and up).

"Jumping Up" has been made for 'Gaming on Linux Game Jam 2015'. It's been inspired by an old speccy game Jumping Jack.
